title: ChinAPIs: Access Chinese Data via Public APIs and Curated Datasets
text: ChinAPIs package provides unified interface access open data World Bank API, Nager.Date API, REST Countries API, focus China. allows users retrieve --date information topics economic indicators, population statistics, unemployment rates, holidays, basic geopolitical details. addition API-access functions, package includes one largest curated collections open datasets related China Hong Kong. datasets cover areas air quality, demographic indicators, input-output economic tables, epidemiology, administrative divisions, name distributions, political structure, various social indicators. ChinAPIs designed support users working data related China combining international API sources structured datasets public, academic, governmental sources single, easy--use R package.

title: ChinAPIs: Access Chinese Data via Public APIs and Curated Datasets
text: ChinAPIs package provides several core functions access real-time structured information China public APIs World Bank API, Nager.Date, REST Countries. list main functions included package: get_country_info_cn(): Get key geopolitical administrative information China REST Countries API get_china_gdp(): Get China’s Gross Domestic Product (current US$) World Bank get_china_cpi(): Get China’s Consumer Price Index World Bank get_china_population(): Get China’s total population World Bank get_china_literacy_rate(): Get China’s adult literacy rate (Age 15+) World Bank get_china_life_expectancy(): Get life expectancy birth China World Bank get_china_unemployment(): Get China’s Unemployment Rate World Bank get_china_energy_use(): Get China’s energy use per capita (kg oil equivalent) World Bank get_china_child_mortality(): Get -5 mortality rate (per 1,000 live births) China World Bank get_china_hospital_beds(): Get hospital beds per 1,000 people China World Bank get_china_holidays(): Get official public holidays China given year, e.g. get_china_holidays(2025) view_datasets_ChinAPIs(): Lists curated datasets included ChinAPIs package functions allow users access high-quality structured information China, can combined tools like dplyr ggplot2 support wide range data analysis, visualization, research tasks. following sections, ’ll find examples work ChinAPIs practical scenarios.

what: China’s GDP (Current US$) from World Bank 2022 - 2017
title: ChinAPIs: Access Chinese Data via Public APIs and Curated Datasets

what: Total Population by District in Hong Kong
title: ChinAPIs: Access Chinese Data via Public APIs and Curated Datasets
code: # Plot total population by district with formatted x-axis labels hk_population_tbl_df %>%   arrange(desc(TotalPopulation)) %>%   ggplot(aes(x = reorder(District_EN, TotalPopulation), y = TotalPopulation)) +   geom_col(fill = "steelblue") +   coord_flip() +   scale_y_continuous(labels = function(x) format(x, big.mark = ",", scientific = FALSE)) +   labs(     title = "Total Population by District in Hong Kong",     x = "District",     y = "Total Population"   ) +   theme_minimal()

title: ChinAPIs: Access Chinese Data via Public APIs and Curated Datasets
text: addition API access functions, ChinAPIs provides one largest curated collections open datasets focused China Hong Kong. preloaded datasets cover topics air quality, administrative divisions, input-output tables, names, demographics, infrastructure, public health. featured examples: hk_population_tbl_df: Hong Kong Population District Age Group chinese_cities_tbl_df: tibble contains information 367 prominent cities China family_name_df: Chinese Surnames National Frequency (1930–2008)

title: ChinAPIs: Access Chinese Data via Public APIs and Curated Datasets
text: ChinAPIs package offers comprehensive interface access curated datasets structured data China, encompassing wide range topics relevant country’s environment, economy, demography, public infrastructure. Unlike tools focused solely API connections, ChinAPIs provides preloaded datasets include information air quality Beijing, corruption perception indices, inter-industry input-output tables across multiple years, detailed demographic records, COVID-19 SARS statistics Hong Kong, well data Chinese dams, pandas, administrative divisions, given/family names. datasets enable users analyze patterns urban development, public health, environmental quality, political structure, social trends. package serves valuable resource researchers, educators, journalists, developers interested China’s contemporary landscape, offering localized, high-resolution data tidy formats ready direct use R. Together, ChinAPIs helps bridge gap complex Chinese open data sources accessible, reproducible, transparent data science workflows R.

what: Stated Car Choice Data from Chinese Buyers — china_cars_tbl_df
title: Stated Car Choice Data from Chinese Buyers — china_cars_tbl_df
text: dataset, china_cars_tbl_df, tibble containing stated choice observations conjoint survey conducted Helveston et al. (2015). survey includes 448 choice observations Chinese car buyers 384 U.S. car buyers. surveys administered 2012 across four major Chinese cities (Beijing, Shanghai, Shenzhen, Chengdu), online U.S. via Amazon Mechanical Turk, person Pittsburgh Auto Show. Participants asked choose vehicle set three alternatives 15 choice tasks.

title: PTSD Symptoms of Wenchuan Earthquake Survivors — wenchuan_ptsd_matrix
text: dataset, wenchuan_ptsd_matrix, matrix containing items measuring symptoms post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD) survivors Wenchuan earthquake. Participants 362 Chinese adults lost least one child disaster. matrix includes 362 observations 17 variables, representing symptom PTSD assessed McNally et al. (2015).
